Page.title: Trello Clone
Page.Description: An Trello clone made by next

info.featuresTitle: Explore the features that help your team succeed

items.inboxDescription: Capture every vital detail from emails, Slack, and more directly into your Trello Inbox.
items.plannerDescription: Sync your calendar and allocate focused time slots to boost productivity.
items.automationDescription: Automate tasks and workflows with Butler automation.
items.powerUpsDescription: Power up your teams by linking their favorite tools with Trello plugins.
items.templatesDescription: Give your team a blueprint for success with easy-to-use templates from industry leaders and the Trello community.
items.integrationsDescription: Find the apps your team is already using or discover new ways to get work done in Trello.

extraInfo.featuresExtraDescription: Trello makes it easy for your team to get work done. No matter the project, workflow, or type of team, Trello can help keep things organized. It’s simple – sign-up, create a board, and you’re off! Productivity awaits.

info.solutionsTitle: Take a page out of these pre-built Trello playbooks designed for all teams

items.marketingTeamsDescription: Whether launching a new product, campaign, or creating content, Trello helps marketing teams succeed.
items.productManagementDescription: Use Trello’s management boards and roadmap features to simplify complex projects and processes.
items.engineeringTeamsDescription: Empower your design teams by using Trello to streamline creative requests and promote more fluid cross-team collaboration.
items.designTeamsDescription: Empower your design teams by using Trello to streamline creative requests and promote more fluid cross-team collaboration.
items.startupsDescription: From hitting revenue goals to managing workflows, small businesses thrive with Trello.
items.remoteTeamsDescription: Keep your remote team connected and motivated, no matter where they’re located around the world.

items.description1: Track progress of tasks in one convenient place with a visual layout that adds ‘ta-da’ to your to-do’s.
items.description2: Save hours when you give teams a well-designed hub to find information easily and quickly.
items.description3: Keep projects organized, deadlines on track, and teammates aligned with Trello.

items.standardDescription: For teams that need to manage more work and scale collaboration.
items.premiumDescription: Best for teams up to 100 that need to track multiple projects and visualize work in a variety of ways.
items.enterpriseDescription: Everything your enterprise teams and admins need to manage projects.
items.freeDescription: For individuals or small teams looking to keep work organized.

extraInfo.plansExtraDescription: Whether you’re a team of 2 or 2,000, Trello’s flexible pricing model means you only pay for what you need.

items.trelloGuideDescription: Our easy to follow workflow guide will take you from project set-up to Trello expert in no time.
items.remoteWorkGuideDescription: The complete guide to setting up your team for remote work success.
items.webinarsDescription: Enjoy our free Trello webinars and become a productivity professional.
items.customersStoriesDescription: See how businesses have adopted Trello as a vital part of their workflow.
items.developersDescription: The sky's the limit in what you can deliver to Trello users in your Power-Up!
items.helpResourcesDescription: Need help? Articles and FAQs to get you unstuck.

extraInfo.resourcesExtraDescription: Discover Trello use cases, productivity tips, best practices for team collaboration, and expert remote work advice.

section1.title: Capture, organize, and tackle your to-dos from anywhere.
section1.subTitle: Escape the clutter and chaos—unleash your productivity with Trello.
section1.description: By entering my email, I acknowledge the Atlassian Privacy Policy

section2.title: Your productivity powerhouse
section2.subTitle: Trello 101
section2.description: Stay organized and efficient with Inbox, Boards, and Planner. Every to-do, idea, or responsibility—no matter how small—finds its place, keeping you at the top of your game.

Inbox.title: Inbox
Inbox.description: When it’s on your mind, it goes in your Inbox. Capture your to-dos from anywhere, anytime.

Boards.title: Boards
Boards.description: Your to-do list may be long, but it can be manageable! Keep tabs on everything from "to-dos to tackle" to "mission accomplished!”

Planner.title: Planner
Planner.description: Drag, drop, get it done. Snap your top tasks into your calendar and make time for what truly matters.

section3.title: From message to action
section3.subTitle: Quickly turn communication from your favorite apps into to-dos, keeping all your discussions and tasks organized in one place.

EmailMagic.title: Email Magic
EmailMagic.description: Easily turn your emails into to-dos! Just forward them to your Trello Inbox, and they’ll be transformed by Atlassian Intelligence (AI) into organized to-dos with all the links you need.

MessageAppSorcery.title: Message App Sorcery
MessageAppSorcery.description: Need to follow up on a message from Slack or Microsoft Teams? Send it directly to your Trello board! Your favorite app interface lets you save messages that appear in your Trello Inbox with AI-generated summaries and links.

section4.title: Do more with Trello
section4.subTitle: Work Smarter
section4.description: Customize the way you organize with easy integrations, automation, and mirroring of your to-dos across multiple locations.

Integrations.title: Integrations
Integrations.description: Connect the apps you are already using into your Trello workflow or add a Power-Up to fine-tune your specific needs.

ButlerAutomation.title: Butler Automation
ButlerAutomation.description: No-code automation is built into every Trello board. Focus on the work that matters most and let the robots do the rest.

CardMirroring.title: Card mirroring
CardMirroring.description: View all your to-dos from multiple boards in one place. Mirror a card to keep track of work wherever you need it!

Jobs.title: Jobs
Jobs.subTitle: Learn about open roles on the Trello team.

Apps.title: Apps
Apps.subTitle: Download the Trello App for your Desktop or Mobile devices.

ContactUs.title: ContactUs
ContactUs.subTitle: Need anything? Get in touch and we can help.
